mapper.insert: insert IGNORE into ${tableName} (user_id, train_start_time, train_end_time, theme, lecturer, site, detail, conference_id, github_url, image_id) values (#{userId}, #{trainStartTime}, #{trainEndTime}, #{theme}, #{lecturer}, #{site}, #{detail}, #{conferenceId}, #{githubUrl}, #{imageId})
mapper.update: update ${tableName} set like_number = like_number +1 where id = #{id}
